parsed_email.subject: Urgent - Garbage disposal needed for MV Sea Navigator
parsed_email.body_text:
URGENT REQUEST

Vessel: MV Sea Navigator
Port: Rotterdam
ETA: Tomorrow 06:00

We require immediate garbage and waste disposal services upon arrival.
Approximately 15 cubic meters of general waste and refuse.

Please arrange collection crew and confirm timing ASAP.

Contact: Captain Smith
Mobile: +31-123-456789

classification.summary: Urgent request for garbage and waste disposal services for MV Sea Navigator upon arrival tomorrow.
